props.name: modelValue
props.description: Value of the component.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value for the input when not controlled by  `modelValue` .

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute for the element, typically used in form submissions.

props.name: options
props.description: An array of treenodes.

props.name: expandedKeys
props.description: A map of keys to represent the expansion state in controlled mode.

props.name: showClear
props.description: When enabled, a clear icon is displayed to clear the value.

props.name: clearIcon
props.description: Icon to display in clear button.

props.name: scrollHeight
props.description: Height of the viewport, a scrollbar is defined if height of list exceeds this value.

props.name: selectionMode
props.description: Defines the selection mode.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Spans 100% width of the container when enabled.

props.name: appendTo
props.description: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.

props.name: display
props.description: Defines how the selected items are displayed.

props.name: selectedItemsLabel
props.description: Label to display after exceeding max selected labels.

props.name: maxSelectedLabels
props.description: Decides how many selected item labels to show at most.

props.name: metaKeySelection
props.description:
Defines how multiple items can be selected, when true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually.
On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

props.name: loading
props.description: Whether to display loading indicator.

props.name: loadingIcon
props.description: Icon to display when tree is loading.

props.name: loadingMode
props.description: Loading mode display.

props.name: filter
props.description: When specified, displays an input field to filter the items.

props.name: filterBy
props.description: When filtering is enabled, filterBy decides which field or fields (comma separated) to search against. A callable taking a TreeNode can be provided instead of a list of field names.

props.name: filterMode
props.description: Mode for filtering.

props.name: filterPlaceholder
props.description: Placeholder text to show when filter input is empty.

props.name: filterLocale
props.description: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

props.name: emptyMessage
props.description: Text to display when there are no options available. Defaults to value from PrimeVue locale configuration.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Label to display when there are no selections.

props.name: size
props.description: Defines the size of the component.

props.name: invalid
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

props.name: variant
props.description: Specifies the input variant of the component.

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

props.name: inputId
props.description: Identifier of the underlying input element.

props.name: inputClass
props.description: Style class of the input field.

props.name: inputStyle
props.description: Inline style of the input field.

props.name: inputProps
props.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

props.name: panelClass
props.description: Style class of the overlay panel.

props.name: ariaLabelledby
props.description: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Establishes a string value that labels the component.

props.name: formControl
props.description: Form control object, typically used for handling validation and form state.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: pt
props.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

props.name: ptOptions
props.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

props.name: unstyled
props.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

parameters.name: scope
scope
scope
scope

slots.name: triggericon

parameters.name: scope

slots.deprecated:
since v4.0. use 'dropdownicon' slot instead.
Custom indicator template.

parameters.name: scope

slots.name: itemtogglericon

parameters.name: scope

slots.deprecated:
since v4.0. Use 'itemtoggleicon' slot instead.
Custom item toggler icon template.

parameters.name: scope
scope
scope

emits.name: value-change
emits.description: Emitted when the value changes in uncontrolled mode.

emits.name: update:expandedKeys
emits.description: Emitted when the expanded keys change.

emits.name: change
emits.description: Callback to invoke on value change.

emits.name: before-show
emits.description: Callback to invoke before the overlay is shown.

emits.name: before-hide
emits.description: Callback to invoke before the overlay is hidden.

emits.name: show
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the overlay is shown.

emits.name: hide
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the overlay is hidden.

emits.name: node-select
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is selected.

emits.name: node-unselect
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is unselected.

emits.name: node-expand
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is expanded.

emits.name: node-collapse
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is collapsed.
